text:
Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: Umtiti and Demb√©l√© back!
On the occasion of the match of the fourth day of the Champions League against Slavia Prague, Ernesto Valverde decided to call the two world champions
04 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Charlie Creteur



The Blaugrana will have to react to Slavia Prague after conceding their third defeat of the Liga season against Levante (3-1). Criticized in recent weeks for his defensive largesse, FC Barcelona had also not convinced in the game during the first confrontation against Prague on the third day of the Champions League (1-2). Ernesto Valverde's players will be keen to do better at Camp Nou with the return of Ousmane Demb√©l√© and Samuel Umtiti.




The Blaugrana group to face Slavia Prague




Ernesto Valverde + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport
